title: Similar to Clarendon, Belizio.
content:
Hi there,

Wondering if anyone can identify this typeface from: [www.manvsmachine.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055015/http:/www.manvsmachine.co.uk/ "www.manvsmachine.co.uk")

Looking for something like Clarendon, Eames modern, Belizio and this caught my eye.

cheers

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055015im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-10-29%20at%2020.13.12.png)  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055015im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-10-29%20at%2020.13.17.png)

Font: 

 Galaxy Copernicus 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055015/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

author: thurston

comments.content: [Galaxie Copernicus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055015/http:/vllg.com/constellation/galaxie-copernicus) by Constellation Chester Jenkins (except /& which is probably Garamond)
Great thanks for the quick reply!
